org.apache.derby.impl.sql.execute

Class ValueRow

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.derby.impl.sql.execute.ValueRow
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ExecRow, Row
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    IndexRow

    class ValueRow
extends java.lang.Object
implements ExecRow
    Basic implementation of ExecRow.
